attributes.action: To STOP building prisons in Wickford and in Essex.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is against the Government's proposed plan to build up prison in Wickford, which would hold 1500 inmates. Our town needs regeneration, not a prison on our doorstep. Please sign the petition and say NO to a prison in Wickord. Say NO to prisons on your doorstep.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "To STOP building prisons in Wickford and in Essex."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21794


Prime Minister's Office
